InteropTopicNtfcnResource.name: InteropTopicNtfcnResource
InteropTopicNtfcnResource.description: Represents the notification resource for an interoperability topic.

IncludedRelaRsrcFieldSpec.description: Any additional related resource fields specification that may be included in the notification.

IncludedResourceFieldSpec.description: The resource fields specification that should be included in the notification.

InteropTopicId.description: The interoperability topic for which the notification resource is specified.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic notification resource record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic notification resource record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the interoperability topic notification resource.

Resource.description: The resource for which the notification is sent.
